SEARCH
Module oop.oop_projekt
Package oop.controller

Class VotingController

java.lang.Object
oop.controller.VotingController
public class VotingController extends Object
The VotingController class manages the voting process within the application. It interacts with the VotingSystem to cast votes for wines, initializes wines for voting from a CSV file, and handles user wallet transactions related to voting.

  • Constructor Details

    • VotingController

      public VotingController(DashboardView view)
      Constructs a new VotingController with the specified view. Initializes the voting system and the wines available for voting.
      Parameters:
      view - the DashboardView used to display voting results and messages to the user.

  • Method Details

    • initializeWines

      public void initializeWines()
      Initializes the list of wines available for voting from a predefined CSV file.

    • castVote

      public void castVote(User user, String wineName)
      Casts a vote for a specified wine by a user. Updates the view based on the success or failure of the voting attempt.
      Parameters:
      user - the User attempting to cast a vote.
      wineName - the name of the wine the user is voting for.

    • getWines

      public Map<String,Wine> getWines()
      Returns the current map of wines available for voting.
      Returns:
      a Map where keys are wine names and values are Wine objects.

    • initializeWinesFromCSV

      public void initializeWinesFromCSV(String csvFilePath)
      Initializes the wines available for voting by reading from a CSV file. This method is designed to be used internally within the class.
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - the path to the CSV file containing the list of wines.

    • addFundsToUserWallet

      public void addFundsToUserWallet(double amount)
      Adds funds to the current user's wallet. Displays a message indicating the success or failure of the operation.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to add to the user's wallet.

    • showCurrentUserBalance

      public void showCurrentUserBalance()
      Displays the current balance of the user's wallet in an alert dialog.

    • logoutUser

      public void logoutUser(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Logs out the current user and returns to the login view.
      Parameters:
      stage - the current stage that should be closed upon logging out.

    • buyPremium

      public void buyPremium()
      Initiates the process for a user to buy a premium account. This method is a placeholder for future implementation.
